high_descs: Walk to the chair on your left.
Pick up the pillow from the chair.
Go to the table on your left.
anns.task_desc: Look at a pillow under lamp light.

high_descs: Move to the two sofa chairs facing the one on the left against the wall
Pick up the red cushion on top of the chair
Carry the cushion to the brown side table to the left of the chairs
Turn on the lamp on top of the side table
anns.task_desc: Turn on a lamp while holding a cushion

high_descs: Turn left and begin walking across the room, then hang a right and walk up to the chair.
Pick up the pillow off of the seat of the chair.
Turn left and walk across the room to the wall, then turn right and walk over to the small end table.
Turn on the lamp that is on the end table.
anns.task_desc: Examine a pillow in the light of a small lamp.
